name: Cute Hedgehog
description: Cute Hedgehog is a story about a little hungry and harmless hedgehog, who is forced to confront the world, to earn for his living.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP\Vista\7\8\10 Processor: 1.2 Ghz Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: 500MB DirectX: Version 8.0 Storage: 250 MB available space Additional Notes: Keyboard and Mouse
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP\Vista\7\8\10 Processor: 2 Ghz Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: 1GB DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 300 MB available space Additional Notes: Keyboard and Mouse
